attributes.action: ban political correctness in all its forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it's just ridiculous isnt it.  My son is learning about the wonders of "baa baa rainbow sheep" and was banned from saying the word christmas in his local school.

Let's go back to calling a spade a spade.  enough is enough!!  so who's with me?!
